question: Which Indian state/UT has approved Border Roads Organization (BRO) to recruit workers from the state for critical projects?
explanation:
The Chief Minister of Jharkhand Hemant Soren has approved the Border Roads Organization (BRO) to recruit over 11,800 workers from the state for critical projects.
The projects include the critical areas including those near the China border in Ladakh for Operation Vijayak and in Uttarakhand, Himachal Pradesh and Jammu & Kashmir. The state is also set to sign a first-of-its-kind memorandum of understanding (MoU) with the BRO to ensure welfare of all workers to be recruited in the future.
